html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-10892018-09-04,  GAC,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of Mark Allen as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Hellenic Republic; Richard Arbeiter as Ambassador and Deputy Permanent Representative of Canada to the United Nations, in New York ; Antoine Chevrier as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia and as Permanent Observer of Canada to the African Union and as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Djibouti, with residence in Addis Ababa ; James Christoff as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of South Sudan ; Micheal Danagher as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Korea ; Louis-Pierre Emond as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the State of Kuwait ; Robert Paul Gibbard as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Iraq ; Elizabeth Rice Madan as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Portuguese Republic ; Stefanie McCollum as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the State of Qatar ; David Metcalfe as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan ; Lilly Nicholls as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Panama ; Kevin Rex as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Latvia and as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Estonia, with residence in Riga; Leslie Scanlon as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Poland ; and Lisa Stadelbauer as High Commissioner for Canada to the Republic of Kenya and as Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Canada to the United Nations Centre for Human Settlements and to the United Nations Environment Program.
AttachmentsAttachment
